amendment.description: Insert: ? SEC. __. The amounts otherwise provided by this Act are revised by increasing the amount made available for "United States Secret Service--Protection, Administration, and Training" and the amount made available for "Federal Emergency Management Agency--Readiness, Mitigation, Response, and Recovery" by $2,000,000 respectively.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make adjustments to two accounts in the bill: Protection, Administration, and Training for the Secret Service; and Readiness, Mitigation, Response, and Recovery for FEMA. In each case, the amounts provided are increased by $2 million respectively.
